com.camerontec.catalys.util.task

Class ControlledTaskBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.task.ControlledTaskBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControlledTask, ITask, Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TechnologyAdapterBase.PolledPeerReaderTask

    public abstract class ControlledTaskBase
extends Object
implements IControlledTask
    Simple base class for implementations of IControlledTask which provides default implementations of all methods except setController(com.camerontec.catalys.util.task.ITaskController) and Runnable.run().

    Subclasses must still provide an implementation of Runnable.run().

    An implementation of setController(com.camerontec.catalys.util.task.ITaskController) is provided.

      • interrupt

        public void interrupt()
               throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IControlledTask
        Interrupt the executing task.

        This method may be invoked by the ITaskController should it require the task to terminate. The ITaskController.shouldContinue() method may be used to determine whether this is the case. When instructed to terminate, the task should task all necessary steps to enabled this to occur.

        Note that this method is likely to be invoked in a separate thread to Runnable.run() and implementations must take this into account.

        Specified by:
        interrupt in interface IControlledTask
        Throws:
        Exception - TBD

      • close

        public void close()
           throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IControlledTask
        Clear down this task after execution.

        When this task executed by an ITaskController this method is guaranteed to be called after Runnable.run().

        Specified by:
        close in interface IControlledTask
        Throws:
        Exception - TBD

      • open

        public void open()
          throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IControlledTask
        Prepare this task for execution.

        When this task is executed by an ITaskController this method is guaranteed to be called before Runnable.run().

        Similarly, Runnable.run() won't be called if this method throws an exception.

        Specified by:
        open in interface IControlledTask
        Throws:
        Exception - On error.

      • setController

        public boolean setController(ITaskController controller)
        Description copied from interface: IControlledTask
        Set this task's controller.

        This method fails if there is already a controller set.

        Specified by:
        setController in interface IControlledTask
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller.
        Returns:
        True if the controller was set, false otherwise.

      • shouldContinue

        public boolean shouldContinue()
